channel.title: Videos on Aikido
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on Aikido

item.title: Advanced Techniques
item.description: High Fall/Roll Henka Waza - changing techniques Kaeshi Waza - counter techniques Ikkyo and Aiki Ken - sword applications Centering Aiki - joining energies

item.title: Attacks in Aikido
item.description: Grab Attacks Strikes - attacker techniques Aikido against Punches Atemi - striking techniques

item.title: Basic Techniques
item.description: Nikkyo Sankyo Yonkyo Iriminage Shionage Kotegaeshi Tenchinage Kokyunage Kokyuho Ushiro - grips from behind Suwari Kokyuho

item.title: Weapons in Aikido
item.description: Tanto Dori - defence against knife Jo Dori - defence against staff Ken Suburi - basic solo sword exercises Aiki Ken - basic entering exercises Aikibatto - ten duo sword exercises
